description: The recurrence b(k)=10*b(k-1)+k^n with b(0)=0 has b(k)/10^k converging to a(n)/9^(n+1).
references: Alex Walker, On the Growth of Sequences, 2007
formula: Sum_{x from 1 to infinity} (9^(n+1))(x^n) / 10^x. - _Alexander Walker_, Feb 26 2007
author: _Henry Bottomley_, Jul 04 2000
extensions: Corrected and extended by _Emeric Deutsch_, Mar 23 2007
